FunctionLevelAnalysis.newOwner: Allows the addition of a new owner, but lacks access control, meaning any caller can assign new ownership.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.deleteOwner: Enables the deletion of an owner, restricted to either the root owner or the parent owner.
FunctionLevelAnalysis.withdrawAll: Enables owners to transfer the contractâ€™s entire balance to their own address.

DecisionPoints: require(_owner != 0) in newOwner to ensure non-zero owner address.
require(owners[_owner] == msg.sender || (owners[_owner] != 0 && msg.sender == root)) in deleteOwner to check proper authority for deletion.
StateTransitionPoints: Updates `owners` mapping in newOwner and deleteOwner functions.
Contract balance is transferred in withdrawAll.
